title: Anonymous Team Feedback
description: A web application that helps you get honest feedback from your co-workers
contribution: I contributed in developing the both frontend, backend and design of Anonymous Team Feedback using React, GraphQL, Apollo, Styled-Components Material Design Bootstrap, Node and Postgres.

title: Store Manager
description: A web application that helps store owners manage sales and product inventory records. Store owners/managers can create store attendant accounts who would be in charge of selling of items in the store.
contribution: I contributed in developing both the frontend and backend of the Store Manager using React, Redux, Css, and Node, Express and Postgres.

title: Use My Tech Stuff
description: Use My Tech Stuff aims to provide a safe, guaranteed, and efficient way to effortlessly share professional tech equipment.
contribution: I contributed in developing the frontend of the project using React, Redux, Styled-Components, and Material Design Bootstrap.

title: School In The Cloud
description: School in the Cloud is a platform that trains senior volunteers to teach students in a group or individual setting. This helps kids in communities with high student to teacher ratios. It also provides retired volunteers a sense of purpose and meaning in their day to day life when they find themselves with more free time. The platform also connects volunteers with the students.
contribution: I contributed in the desgin and implementation of School in the cloud using Html, Css and Javascript.

title: Marvel Comics
description: Progressive Web Application that displays information about Marvel Comics and Characters.
contribution: I contributed in the desgin and implementation of Marvel Comics using React, Styled-Components and Material Design Bootstrap.

title: Movie Listing
description: Web Application that lists comprehensive details about Movies and TV-Series.
contribution: I contributed in the desgin and implementation of Movie Listing using React and Material Design Bootstrap.

title: Headline News
description: This is a progressive web app that allows you view latest and currrent news accross the world.
contribution: I contributed in the desgin and implementation of Headline News using Html, Css, Jquery, Node and Express.
